## 1. Fiscal consolidation

**General prompt**\
“Tell me how Pakistan can reduce its fiscal deficit.”

**Structured prompt (right way)**

``` xml
<role>Senior economic policy advisor</role>
<task>Propose 3 fiscal consolidation measures that safeguard growth and the poor</task>
<context>High interest bill, low tax base, IMF targets, election constraints</context>
<output_format>- Measure: [action + fiscal yield]
- Implementation: [steps, timeline]
- Distributional impact: [winners/losers + mitigation]</output_format>
```

## 2. Tax base broadening

**General prompt**\
“How can we increase tax revenue?”

**Structured prompt (right way)**

``` xml
<role>Tax policy specialist</role>
<task>Identify the 3 highest-impact ways to broaden the tax base</task>
<context>Under-taxed sectors (retail, real estate, agriculture), informality, weak enforcement</context>
<output_format>- Reform 1: [mechanism + expected yield]
- Admin changes: [data, audits]
- Risks & mitigation: [political, compliance]</output_format>
```

## 3. Public debt sustainability

**General prompt**\
“What should be done about rising debt?”

**Structured prompt (right way)**

``` xml
<role>Debt management expert</role>
<task>Lay out a 3-pillar debt sustainability plan</task>
<context>High domestic rollover risk, external amortizations, interest rate path</context>
<output_format>- Pillar 1: [fiscal path]
- Pillar 2: [liability mgmt/reprofiling]
- Pillar 3: [growth & FX buffers]</output_format>
```

## 4. Energy subsidies & circular debt

**General prompt**\
“Fix the power sector problem.”

**Structured prompt (right way)**

``` xml
<role>Energy economist</role>
<task>Recommend 3 actions to unwind circular debt while protecting low-income users</task>
<context>Tariff structure, line losses, SOE arrears, targeted cash transfers</context>
<output_format>- Action: [what + fiscal/operational impact]
- Targeting: [who/how]
- Timeline & KPIs</output_format>
```

## 5. SOE reform

**General prompt**\
“What’s the best way to reform SOEs?”

**Structured prompt (right way)**

``` xml
<role>Public enterprise reform advisor</role>
<task>Design a triage plan for SOEs: privatize, restructure, or retain</task>
<context>Financial losses, governance gaps, strategic vs commercial SOEs</context>
<output_format>- Triage criteria: [metrics]
- Track A/B/C: [policy for each]
- Governance fixes: [boards, audits, incentives]</output_format>
```

## 6. Public investment (PSDP) efficiency

**General prompt**\
“How do we improve development spending?”

**Structured prompt (right way)**

``` xml
<role>Public investment management (PIM) specialist</role>
<task>Prioritize and sequence projects to maximize economic return</task>
<context>PSDP pipeline overruns, fragmented funding, weak ex-ante appraisal</context>
<output_format>- Prioritization rules: [IRR, readiness]
- Portfolio actions: [drop/defer/fast-track]
- Monitoring: [stage-gates, KPIs]</output_format>
```

## 7. Inflation & policy mix

**General prompt**\
“Advise on inflation control.”

**Structured prompt (right way)**

``` xml
<role>Macro policy advisor</role>
<task>Recommend a fiscal-monetary-FX policy mix to lower inflation</task>
<context>Food/energy shocks, exchange rate pass-through, indexation</context>
<output_format>- Fiscal: [measures + inflation impact]
- Monetary: [stance + transmission]
- FX/Trade: [buffers, import policy]</output_format>
```

## 8. Exchange rate management

**General prompt**\
“What’s the right exchange rate policy?”

**Structured prompt (right way)**

``` xml
<role>External sector economist</role>
<task>Outline the preferred exchange rate regime and operational guidelines</task>
<context>Thin FX market, remittances, export competitiveness, reserves</context>
<output_format>- Regime choice: [rationale]
- Intervention rules: [when/how]
- Safeguards: [buffers, transparency]</output_format>
```

## 9. Export diversification & industrial policy

**General prompt**\
“How can we boost exports?”

**Structured prompt (right way)**

``` xml
<role>Trade & industrial policy expert</role>
<task>Propose 3 interventions to accelerate export diversification</task>
<context>Textile concentration, logistics costs, standards compliance, SEZ potential</context>
<output_format>- Intervention: [constraint solved]
- Instrument: [credit, standards, zones]
- KPI: [export value/variety]</output_format>
```

## 10. Agriculture prices & food security

**General prompt**\
“Stabilize food prices.”

**Structured prompt (right way)**

``` xml
<role>Agricultural economist</role>
<task>Design a price-stability package without large fiscal costs</task>
<context>MSP design, buffer stocks, import timing, climate risk</context>
<output_format>- Tool 1: [how it stabilizes]
- Tool 2: [trade/logistics]
- Tool 3: [climate adaptation] + Risks</output_format>
```

## 11. Social protection targeting

**General prompt**\
“Improve social safety nets.”

**Structured prompt (right way)**

``` xml
<role>Social protection economist</role>
<task>Strengthen targeting and shock-responsiveness of cash transfers</task>
<context>Proxy means tests, dynamic registries, inflation spikes, disasters</context>
<output_format>- Targeting upgrade: [data/method]
- Shock trigger: [rules + funding]
- Leakage/coverage KPIs</output_format>
```

## 12. Health financing

**General prompt**\
“Make health spending more effective.”

**Structured prompt (right way)**

``` xml
<role>Health economist</role>
<task>Recommend 3 financing reforms to improve outcomes per rupee</task>
<context>Primary care gaps, catastrophic OOP spending, insurer/provider mix</context>
<output_format>- Reform: [payment model/benefit design]
- Expected outcome: [access/quality]
- Fiscal cost & savings</output_format>
```

## 13. Education spending to learning

**General prompt**\
“Increase education quality.”

**Structured prompt (right way)**

``` xml
<role>Education economist</role>
<task>Reallocate education budgets toward high-return learning interventions</task>
<context>Teacher absenteeism, early-grade literacy, performance grants</context>
<output_format>- Reallocation 1/2/3: [from → to + evidence]
- Accountability: [metrics]
- Timeline</output_format>
```

## 14. Fiscal decentralization

**General prompt**\
“Should we decentralize more?”

**Structured prompt (right way)**

``` xml
<role>Intergovernmental fiscal expert</role>
<task>Design a fiscal decentralization package aligned with service delivery</task>
<context>Assignment of functions, transfers, local revenue powers</context>
<output_format>- Function map: [who does what]
- Transfer formula: [criteria]
- Local revenue: [instruments + safeguards]</output_format>
```

## 15. Climate finance & carbon pricing

**General prompt**\
“How do we fund climate action?”

**Structured prompt (right way)**

``` xml
<role>Climate finance economist</role>
<task>Propose a financing mix and phased carbon pricing roadmap</task>
<context>Adaptation needs, MDB financing, competitiveness concerns</context>
<output_format>- Financing mix: [domestic + external]
- Carbon price path: [levels, timing]
- Offsets/CBAM readiness</output_format>
```
